pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sensitivity Analysis Tools for OLS // Implements a suite of sensitivity analysis tools that extends the traditional omitted variable bias framework and makes it easier to understand the impact of omitted variables in regression models, as discussed in Cinelli and Hazlett (2018) https://www.researchgate.net/publ ication/322509816_Making_Sense_of_Sensitivity_Extending_Omitted _Variable_Bias.
